person.persName: James W. Gault (Mason County physician and soldier)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, physician and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Edward L. Gault. Married to Mary Ann Killgore Gault in Mason County, Kentucky, on October 14, 1853. Father of Pearlie Gault. Farmer in Mason County in 1850. Physician in Mason County in 1860. Served in the 16th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as captain, major, lieutenant colonel, and colonel from January 27, 1862 to February 1, 1865. Promoted to major on March 15, 1862. Promoted to lieutenant colonel on July 21, 1862. Commissioned as colonel on June 3, 1863.
